heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State 
from Certain States) (No. 4) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 4) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 4)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 4) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 44 of 2021) are amended, in paragraph (3) of 
Regulation 1, by the substitution of “the 5th day of April 2021” for “the 5th 
day of March 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [100] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations extend until 5th April 2021 the effective date of S.I. No. 44 
of 2021 - Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (COVID19) (Restrictions Upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No.4) 
Regulations 2021 which places mandatory testing and quarantine requirements 
on certain categories of international travellers. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [100]
